001/**  This controller provides functionality for the order page and dynamically load items from the database
002 * @author Shruti Oruganti
003 */
004
005package src.controller;
006
007import javafx.fxml.FXML;
008import javafx.scene.layout.VBox;
009import javafx.scene.control.*;
010import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
011import javafx.scene.image.ImageView;
012import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
013import javafx.scene.Node;
014import javafx.scene.Parent;
015import javafx.scene.Scene;
016import javafx.stage.Stage;
017import javafx.stage.Window;
018import javafx.geometry.Pos;
019import javafx.scene.image.Image;
020import javafx.scene.layout.GridPane;
021
022//For popup
023import javafx.animation.PauseTransition;
024import javafx.stage.Popup;
025import javafx.util.Duration;
026
027import static src.controller.useful_functions.current_user_role;
028import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
029
030import java.io.File;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.util.*;
033
034import src.model.product;
035import src.model.order;
036import src.model.orderItem;
037import src.data.productData;
038
039
040public class order_page_controller {
041
042    @FXML
043    private Button view_metrics_button;
044
045    @FXML
046    private Button switch_user_button;
047
048    @FXML
049    private GridPane menuGrid;
050
051    // Customization Buttons
052    @FXML private Button no_ice, less_ice, regular_ice;
053    @FXML private Button sugar_0, sugar_25, sugar_50, sugar_75, sugar_100;
054    
055
056    //Working with dynamically inserted toopings
057    @FXML private VBox toppingContainer;
058
059    //Displaying current order
060    @FXML private ListView<String> current_order_list;
061    
062    private order currentOrder = new order();
063    private orderItem currentOrderItem;
064
065    /**
066     * Initialising the FXML page elements with their handlers and dynamically loading the toppings and drinks on the menu to the order page
067     */
068    @FXML
069    public void initialize() {
070        System.out.println("order page loaded; current role = " + current_user_role);
071        // Ice handlers
072        no_ice.setOnAction(e -> handleIceSelection(0));
073        less_ice.setOnAction(e -> handleIceSelection(50));
074        regular_ice.setOnAction(e -> handleIceSelection(100));
075
076        // Sugar handlers
077        sugar_0.setOnAction(e -> handleSugarSelection(0));
078        sugar_25.setOnAction(e -> handleSugarSelection(25));
079        sugar_50.setOnAction(e -> handleSugarSelection(50));
080        sugar_75.setOnAction(e -> handleSugarSelection(75));
081        sugar_100.setOnAction(e -> handleSugarSelection(100));
082
083        Scene scene = toppingContainer.getScene();
084        if (scene != null && scene.getStylesheets().isEmpty()) {
085            scene.getStylesheets().add(getClass().getResource("/styles.css").toExternalForm());
086        }
087
088        //Topping Button Insertion and Handler
089        List<product> toppings = productData.getToppings();
090        for (product topping : toppings) {
091            Button btn = new Button(topping.getProductName());
092            btn.getStyleClass().add("menu-button");
093            btn.setMaxWidth(Double.MAX_VALUE);
094            btn.setOnAction(e -> handleToppingSelection(topping));
095            toppingContainer.getChildren().add(btn);
096        }
097
098        //Drink Button Insertion and Handler
099        List<product> drinks = productData.getDrinks();
100        File imageFile = new File("JavaFiles/src/controller/placeholder.png");
101        Image cupImage = new Image(imageFile.toURI().toString());
102
103        int col = 0;
104        int row = 0;
105
106        for (product drink : drinks) {
107            // Create Image + Label
108            ImageView imageView = new ImageView(cupImage);
109            imageView.setFitWidth(50);
110            imageView.setFitHeight(50);
111
112            Label name = new Label(drink.getProductName());
113            name.setWrapText(true);
114            name.setMaxWidth(100);
115            name.setAlignment(Pos.CENTER); 
116            name.setStyle("-fx-font-size: 12px; -fx-font-weight: bold;");
117
118
119            VBox card = new VBox(5, imageView, name);
120            card.setAlignment(Pos.CENTER);
121            card.setSpacing(2);
122            card.setStyle("-fx-background-color: #FFF5E1; -fx-padding: 10; "
123                         + "-fx-border-color: #E6CFA7; -fx-border-width: 1; -fx-border-radius: 5;");
124
125            // Add click handler
126            card.setOnMouseClicked(event -> handleDrinkSelection(drink));
127            menuGrid.add(card, col, row);
128
129            //Only having 3 drinks per row
130            col++;
131            if (col == 3) {
132                col = 0;
133                row++;
134            }
135        }
136
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * Handler to deal with adding chosen ice level to current order list and storing ice level to commit to db
141     * 
142     * @param ice - Ice-level (0 50 100) of the drink corresponding to the button that calls the handler
143    */
144    private void handleIceSelection(int ice) {
145        if (currentOrderItem != null) {
146            currentOrderItem.setIceLevel(ice);
147            updateCurrentOrderBox();
148        }
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Handler to deal with adding chosen sugar level to current order list and storing sugar level to commit to db
153     * 
154     * @param sugar - Sugar-level (0 25 50 75 100) of the drink corresponding to the button that calls the handler
155    */
156    private void handleSugarSelection(int sugar) {
157        if (currentOrderItem != null) {
158            currentOrderItem.setSugarLevel(sugar);
159            updateCurrentOrderBox();
160        }
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Handler to deal with adding chosen topping to current order list and storing the topping to commit to db
165     * 
166     * @param topping - Topping corresponding to the button that calls the handler
167    */
168    private void handleToppingSelection(product topping) {
169        System.out.println("Topping selected");
170        currentOrderItem = new orderItem(topping);
171        currentOrder.addItem(currentOrderItem);
172        updateCurrentOrderBox();
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Handler to deal with adding chosen drink to current order list and storing the drink to commit to db
177     * 
178     * @param drink - Drink corresponding to the button that calls the handler
179    */
180    private void handleDrinkSelection(product drink) {
181        System.out.println("Topping selected");
182        currentOrderItem = new orderItem(drink);
183        currentOrder.addItem(currentOrderItem);
184        updateCurrentOrderBox();
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * This function updates and correctly formats he current order list for cashier to see all the items added/customized so far
189    */
190    private void updateCurrentOrderBox() {
191        current_order_list.getItems().clear();
192
193        for (orderItem item : currentOrder.getItems()) {
194
195            String line1 = item.getProduct().getProductName() + " - $" + item.getPrice();
196            if (item.getProduct().getId() > 200) {
197                current_order_list.getItems().add(line1);
198            }
199            if (item.getIceLevel() != -1) {
200                current_order_list.getItems().add("Ice: " + item.getIceLevel());
201            }
202            if (item.getSugarLevel() != -1) {
203                current_order_list.getItems().add("Sugar: " + item.getSugarLevel());
204            }
205            if (item.getProduct().getId() < 200) {
206                current_order_list.getItems().add("Topping: " + item.getProduct().getProductName());
207            }
208        }
209        
210        current_order_list.getItems().add("\nSubtotal: $" + currentOrder.getSubtotal());
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * This function handles the click of view metrics buttons and is responsible for restricing access to manager only for viewing metrics 
215     * 
216     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
217    */
218    @FXML
219    private void handle_view_metrics_click(ActionEvent event) {
220        String role = String.valueOf(current_user_role);
221
222        if ("MANAGER".equalsIgnoreCase(role)) {
223            switch_scene("GUI/manager_view.fxml", event);
224            return;
225        }
226
227        // mini popup for 2 seconds
228        Popup toast = new Popup();
229        Label msg = new Label("Switch user to access metrics.");
230        //have to manually style this in java
231        msg.setStyle(
232            "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
233            "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
234            "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
235            "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
236            "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
237        );
238        toast.getContent().add(msg);
239
240        Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
241        Window window = scene.getWindow();
242
243        // Show, then center near bottom
244        toast.show(window);
245        msg.applyCss();
246        msg.layout();
247        //puts it in the middle ish of the screen
248        toast.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
249        toast.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
250
251        //show for 2 seconds
252        PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(2));
253        delay.setOnFinished(e -> toast.hide());
254        delay.play();
255    }
256
257
258    /**
259     * This function handles the back click action
260     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
261     */
262    @FXML
263    private void handle_switch_user_click(ActionEvent event) {
264        switch_scene("GUI/login_page.fxml", event);
265    }
266
267    /**
268     * This function handles the switching to customer information page while keeping track of order details when the purchase button is clicked
269     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
270     */
271    @FXML
272    private void handle_purchase_click(ActionEvent event) {
273        try {
274            FXMLLoader loader = new FXMLLoader(new File("GUI/enter_name.fxml").toURI().toURL());
275            Parent root = loader.load();
276
277            enter_name_controller customerController = loader.getController();
278            if (currentOrder == null) {
279                System.out.println("Order passage failing");
280            }
281            customerController.setOrder(currentOrder);
282
283            Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
284            stage.setScene(new Scene(root));
285            stage.show();
286
287        } catch (IOException e) {
288            e.printStackTrace();
289        }
290        
291    }
292
293}
